column2: For each concept dialect word (MSA, EN, FR, Dialect), we will compute the following dimensions:

column6:
Define ArabicSimilarity (MSA, DIA):
(a) delete all diacritics from MSA and DIA
(b) delete all "weak letters": ا و ي ى ة أ  آ إ ؤ ئ ء  from MSA and DIA
(c) if the edit distance = 0, then S, else D
column15:
(1) each dialect must have one Hard word; one medium and one easy (using Easiness Score)
(2) all concepts should cover all the regions (six, to simplify)
(3) aim to diversify cities in regions

For each concept identify all the words that fall in Hard, Medium and Easy classes

column6:
(a) convert EN and FR to Arabic script (use ChatGPT -offline, once)
(b) apply the ArabicSimilarity method as is and pick the smallest value of ArabicSimilarity (Arabized(EN), DIA), or ArabicSimilarity ((Arabized(FR), DIA)
column15: One Hard, one Medium, one Easy

column5:
L = Low
M = Medium
H = High
column6:
(a) Get the Rounded Log (RL) of the frequency of the DIA word 
(b) map as follows:
RL 0-1 => L
RL 2-4 => M
RL 5-8 => H
column15:
Identify list of words that fit the following criteria:
(a) Edit distance to Hard/Medium/Easy is NOT 0
(b) Edit distance to target MSA or EN or FR is 1 characters (after stripping)
(c) select three from H,M,L DCom
(d) select three from H,M,L DFreq

column5:
L = Low
M = Medium
H = High
column6:
(a) map the 25 cities to the following regions: 
Morocco+Algeria (3)
Tunisia+Libya (4)
Egypt+Sudan (4)
Syria, Lebanon, Jordan, Palestine (6)
Iraq (3)
Qatar+Saudi+Oman+Yemen (5)

(b) count the number of regions above a word appears as is (Pop Count, PC)
(c) map as follows:
PC 1 => L
PC 2-3 => M
PC 4-6 => H
